meanings.definition: The edible flesh of a crab.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat crabmeats with butter and lemon.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a delicious dish of crabmeats.
meanings.sent3: The crabmeats danced on my plate before I devoured them.
meanings.sent4: The crabmeats were a treasure hidden within the shell.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of fresh crabmeats filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: She made a tasty soup using crabmeats as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent2: The market had a special on fresh crabmeats today.
meanings.sent3: The crabmeats in the stew were having a party in my bowl.
meanings.sent4: The crabmeats were like jewels in the seafood platter.
meanings.sent5: The chef skillfully prepared the crabmeats for the dish.
